Package frc.robot.sensors

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • frc.robot.sensors.Camera
  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the Limelight camera connected to the robot over NetworkTables. The data which generated the RPM equation is stored in the doc directory of this code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getAngle()
      Get the angle (with respect to the horizontal axis) of the target, if detected.
      double getArea()
      Returns the area of the target, if detected.
      double getCalculatedDistance()
      Scales limelight area to distance based on regression calculated from setpoints.
      double getCalculatedRPM()
      Gets the calculated RPM for the calculated distance away from the goal.
      static Camera getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of the Camera class.
      double getPosition()
      Get the x-position of the target, if detected.
      boolean hasTarget()
      Determines whether the target has been found.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Print the position, angle, and target status, for use on the SmartDashboard.
      void update()
      A standard method for updating a subsystem or sensor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Camera getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance of the Camera class.

      • update

        public void update()
        A standard method for updating a subsystem or sensor. Call in robotPeriodic(). This updates the various state variables used for followVision.

      • hasTarget

        public boolean hasTarget()
        Determines whether the target has been found.
        Returns:
        boolean representing target detection status

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns the area of the target, if detected.
        Returns:
        0.0 if no target, area otherwise

      • getCalculatedDistance

        public double getCalculatedDistance()
        Scales limelight area to distance based on regression calculated from setpoints. Accounts for angle away from center of the goal and scales RPM accordingly. Using trig to solve for the "hypotenuse" of the triangle, treating distance output as the leg of the triangle.
        Returns:
        calculated distance

      • getCalculatedRPM

        public double getCalculatedRPM()
        Gets the calculated RPM for the calculated distance away from the goal. This is based on a bunch of physics equations which output a 6th-degree polynomial to use. Don't try to understand this or change anything.
        Returns:
        the desired RPM based on distance from target

      • getPosition

        public double getPosition()
        Get the x-position of the target, if detected.
        Returns:
        0.0 if no target, x-position otherwise

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Get the angle (with respect to the horizontal axis) of the target, if detected.
        Returns:
        0.0 if no target, x-angle otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Print the position, angle, and target status, for use on the SmartDashboard.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        "Position,Angle,TargetFound"
